definition: to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

pinyin: ji1 yin1 ran3 se4 ti3 yi4 chang2
ran3 se4 ti3 san1 bei4 ti3 zheng4

definition: Gram stain (used to distinguished two different kinds of bacteria)
pinyin: Ge2 lan2 shi4 ran3 se4 fa3

sentences.english: The fibrous tissues aroud the tumor cells were positive for VG.
sentences.chinese: VG染色示腫瘤細胞周圍有纖維組織反應增生。

sentences.english: This article introduces dyeing of polyamide-66 with brilliant fast reactive dyes.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了錦綸66用豔麗牢活性染料染色的方法。

sentences.english: Cell suspension was collected, and then stained after hypotonic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 收集細胞懸液，再經低滲處理後滴片染色。

sentences.english: This is a typical staining reaction for sarcomas.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種典型的肉瘤染色反應。

sentences.english: Dyeing polyester &nylon, or to make inks .
sentences.chinese: 用於滌綸和錦綸的染色。

sentences.english: Objective: To analyse the regularity of various chromosome anomalies among heredity inquires.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討各類遺傳諮詢者染色體核型異常發生規律。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the value of acid-fast stain test of mycobacterium tuberculosis in the diagnosis of pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解結核分枝桿菌抗酸染色對肺結核的診斷價值。

sentences.english: This probably can save the owner a lot of money instead of applying one-off colouring.
sentences.chinese: 這種行爲比起一次性染色倒是可以給主人省下很多錢。

sentences.english: Some questions about the chromosomal evolution of Vicia are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文還對野豌豆屬染色體進化的有關問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: CRCC was also characteristically positive for colloidal iron.
sentences.chinese: 膠體鐵染色陽性也是CRCC的特徵之一。

sentences.english: I supply dyed yarn do you need dyed ?
sentences.chinese: 我提供色紗你需要染色嗎？

sentences.english: X inactivation starts at the X inactivation center(XIC) and spreads throughout the chromosome.
sentences.chinese: 失活開始於XIC，然後傳播到整條染色體。

sentences.english: The position of the centromere and the behavior of chromosomes during meiosis also important.
sentences.chinese: 着絲粒的位置和染色體在減數分裂中的行爲也很重要。

sentences.english: For example, the medical community uses RDF to describe genomic databases.
sentences.chinese: 例如，醫學組織使用RDF來表述染色體組數據庫。

sentences.english: Burnt sugar, used for coloring and sweetening foods.
sentences.chinese: 燒焦的糖，用於爲食物染色並使之變甜。

sentences.english: The cell at the top is at prophase, showing the condensing chromosomes prior to their separation.
sentences.chinese: 上面的細胞處於分裂前期，凝集的染色體將要分開。

definition: to lose color/to turn pale/to bleach/to fade
to lose color/to fade/also pr. [diao4 shai3]
to color (a picture etc)/to dye (fabric etc)/to stain (furniture etc)
variant of 褪色[tui4 se4]/also pr. [tui4 shai3]
